agent_summary: The Task Extraction Platform is a production-ready AI-powered system that automatically extracts actionable tasks from text, emails, PDFs, and documents using LLM technology. It provides human-in-the-loop review, traceability, confidence scoring, and integrations with Jira, Asana, Microsoft To Do, and webhooks.
agentUsageInstruction: Create a new run by pasting text or uploading files (PDF, DOCX, EML). The system uses LLM to extract tasks with confidence scores and source quotes. Review and edit extracted tasks in the web interface, then export to Excel/CSV/JSON or push selected tasks to integrations like Jira, Asana, or Microsoft To Do.
capabilities: AI-Powered Task Extraction from Text and Documents
Integration with Jira, Asana, Microsoft To Do, Webhooks

workflow.action: Access the web dashboard at http://localhost:3001
Create a new run by pasting text or uploading files (PDF, DOCX, EML)
Select LLM provider (Ollama or Azure OpenAI)
Click 'Extract Tasks' to process content with LLM
Review extracted tasks with confidence scores and source quotes
Edit tasks if needed (title, description, owner, due date)
Select tasks and export to Excel/CSV/JSON or push to integrations
View run history and manage all processed tasks

problem_statement: Manual task extraction from emails, meeting notes, and documents is time-consuming and error-prone. Teams struggle with tracking action items from multiple sources, ensuring accountability, and maintaining visibility of who needs to do what by when.
solution: AI-powered task extraction platform that automatically identifies actionable tasks from text, emails, and documents with confidence scoring and source traceability. Features human-in-the-loop review, intelligent date parsing, and direct integration with popular task management systems.
benefits: 90% reduction in manual task tracking time
100% traceability with source quotes for every task
Multi-file processing for batch email and document handling
Intelligent date parsing converts relative dates to ISO format
Direct integration with Jira, Asana, Microsoft To Do
Human review capability ensures accuracy before export
Confidence scoring helps prioritize task verification

videos.title: Getting Started with Task Extraction Platform
